00011 void Export::exportDataOut(std::vector<std::string> _fluidNameList, std::vector<std::vector<ngl::Vector> > _fluidParticlesPositionsList, EnvironmentAndRigidBody *_environment)
00012 {
00013     m_frameNumber++;
00014 
00015 /*---------------------------Writing the Position of the fluid particles ---------------------------------------- */
00016

00054 void Export::writePointData(std::vector<ngl::Vector> &_fluidParticlePositionsList, const std::string &_filename)
00055 {
00056     //open file for writing
00057     std::ofstream outFile(_filename.c_str(), std::ios::out);
00058 
00059     //write header
00060     outFile << "PGEOMETRY V5\n";
00061     outFile << "NPoints " << _fluidParticlePositionsList.size() << " NPrims 0\n";
00062     outFile << "NPointGroups 0 NPrimGroups 0\n";
00063     outFile << "NPointAttrib 0 NVertexAttrib 0 NPrimAttrib 0 NAttrib 0\n";
00064 
00065     //loop through position list
00066     for (int i = 0; i < _fluidParticlePositionsList.size(); ++i)
00067     {
00068         outFile
00069                 << _fluidParticlePositionsList[i].m_x << " "
00070                 << _fluidParticlePositionsList[i].m_y << " "
00071                 << _fluidParticlePositionsList[i].m_z << " "
00072                 << _fluidParticlePositionsList[i].m_w << "\n";
00073     }
00074 
00075     //write the outro
00076     outFile << "beginExtra\n";
00077     outFile << "endExtra";
00078 
00079     //close file
00080     outFile.close();
00081 }
